content: I am trying to get crucible installed locally for DSTU 2 version of the FHIR spec. When I git cloned and got the code working from here: https://github.com/fhir-crucible/crucible, I saw a message that it's written for STU 3 and that there is another version for DSTU 2. However, it's not very clear how I can get the source code that's compatible with DSTU 2. Can anyone please point me in the right direction?
@harini jagannathan you just have to check out the dstu2 branch.
Ah ok..got it! Thanks @Jason Walonoski !
